name: Don't Update to Windows 10: The Game
name_original: Don't Update to Windows 10: The Game
description:
Don't Update to Windows 10: The Game

I mostly built this game as a way to learn PhaserJs. Its not finished, and a little rough around the edges. Still, I hope it makes someone laugh.

The deadline is approaching! Finish your paper before Windows 10 updates and causes you to lose all your work!

Its open source! Feel free to download the code, modify it, whatever. Some credit would be nice if you do.

https://github.com/eastebry/dont-update
